ftAssocRespIndirect Struct Reference
[Route Under Mac (RUM)]

#include <mac.h>

Detailed Description

Indirect association response frame, sent from the coordinator and (possibly) forwarded by routers to the new node's parent.

Definition at line 603 of file mac.h.
